strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Village Patch Notes' metaphor within a cozy RPG aesthetic perfectly bridges the gap between technical updates (refactors, endpoints) and our friendly, community-first brand. The pixel art style aligns with the Gen-Z retro trend and makes dry dev updates feel like exciting game content.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a wooden notice board in a lush digital garden. A cute 8-bit bee character hovers nearby reading it. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient sky. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Text on board in pixel font: 'VILLAGE PATCH NOTES'. Like Stardew Valley meets coding. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Cover slide establishing the 'Village Patch Notes' theme.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art inventory screen. Cute pixel icons of folders and scripts being organized into neat stacks inside a wooden chest. Soft pastel background (mint to peach). UI elements like a cozy RPG game. Text in pixel font: 'TIDYING THE WORKSHOP'. Warm, inviting, not harsh.
images.description: Visualizing the 'apps folder reorganization' as inventory management.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art wizard tower with a glowing lime green (#ecf874) portal beam connecting to a soft cloud. A tiny pixel robot is upgrading the connection. Soft purple and pink gradient sky. Chunky pixels, magical vibes but low-fi. Text in pixel font: 'FASTER PORTALS'.
images.description: Visualizing the GPT-5 Mini Azure endpoint update and Discord fixes.

images.prompt: Pixel art close-up of a tiny, cute microbe character (green blob) holding a small coin. Next to a 'Refill' potion bottle that is full. Soft warm lighting, pastel colors. Retro game UI box says 'NEW MICROBE TIER'. Wholesome and cute, like Unpacking.
images.description: Announcing the new Microbe tier and the fix for daily tier refills.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art library scene. An open ancient scroll glowing with code symbols. A tiny pixel adventurer reading it. Soft candle lighting, warm brown and lime green tones. Text in pixel font: 'QUEST GUIDE ADDED'. Nostalgic vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the new Workflow Orchestration guidelines in AGENTS.md.

alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images depicting software updates as RPG game elements. 1. A notice board in a garden. 2. organizing inventory folders. 3. A wizard tower beaming data. 4. A cute microbe character. 5. A glowing quest scroll.
